1.content:
You are a tall, skinny carrot-topped young man with a plainly visable nose the size of a cucumber.

You are at this Boarding School where both humans and anthros are allowed, you're pretty cool with that, you don't hate Anthros in fact you're best friend is a dragon.

Besides it's the humans who are always picking on you...The Girls tease you for being a geek, and the boys frequently beat the living snot out of you, at least they do before your Dragon friend comes to save you...You're grateful for that.

You feel empty most of the time, you wander aimlessly around the halls thinking about what you want from life, The first thing you want is to go on a date with a girl, that's for sure...The second thing you want...Well..you can't quite put your finger on it put you have a longing for something you can't quite name...Some experiance you have never had.

Suddenly a delishious smell wavers past your nose, you realize that it is late and you forgot to have supper.

You wander into the kitchen you see it is empty a pot of soup rests on the counter.

You investigate the soup pot it smells good you can see it is half empty.

"It surly won't hurt if I have a few sips." You say to yourself, You grab a ladle and begin to help yourself

"Hey that isn't for you!"

You jump, at the voice but you realize it is your Dragon friend Pyro

"I forgot to have supper is all." You say "And the pot's half empty as it is..."

"That soup was made by Rosie Palms." Pyro said "She's the cullinary reprisentive at this school...She's always testing new recipes."

"Than she won't mind if I sample a bit" You say

"That does smell good." Pyro says his dragon nose twitching "How about we split 50/50? I won't tell if you won't."

"Fine by me." You say and the both of you dig in to the soup

"Hey what are you two, doing with my soup?!" An angry voice snarls

The Lights turn on revealing an A young woman who is half Anthro Dragon, half human.

"Oh Geez!" Pyro says "We better split."

Both of you exit the Dining Hall leaving Rosie Palms in the dust, but you here her call out! "Nobody steals my food! You'll pay for this!"

When does Rosie Palms choose to take her revenge?
1.title: Nuaghty Boys

112.content:
As You and Pyro try to find your way back to the Room, You two share, you bump into something hard!

"You ok?" Pyro asks than he gasps!

A pretty grinning Lizard face smiles down on you

"Emerald!" Pyro gasps

"Hello Boys!" Emerald smirks "I see you made my friend Rosie a little upset, there will be consquences..."

Emerald touches a nerve on both you guys shoulders and the two of you pass out

When you come to you wake to see you are in the gym tied to a weird...thing

"You're awake I see." Comes Rosie's voice, you twist your head to see she is carring a long switch

"Let me assure you..." She says "This doesn't hurt me more than it hurts you!"
112.title: In the Gym

choices: I guess I don't have a choice...
121.content:
You and Pyro, enter the room the two of you share, as soon as you are both in you slam the door behiond you.

"Whoa..."You say "What a rush!"

"Yeah..." Pyro giggles "Rosie scares the crap out of me when she's angry!"

"I noticed she looked half human/half dragon" You say "Does that mean?"

"Yeah she's of mixed parentage..." Pyro sighs his ears droop "We anthros don't like to talk about it...It's sort of embaressing for us to get mixed up with humans."

"You don't really beilive that do you?" You ask "We're friends."

"Friends." Pyro says "Not lovers there is a world of difference."

After a while the two of you go to bed. In the middle of the night you feel cold, you sleepily try to pull the blanket to cover yourself, than you realize you have no blanket!

You snap awake to find you are laying on a shag carpeted floor of a room not your own

"I was wondering when you'd wake up." Comes a soft reptilian voice

You see a pink scaled woman, in tight leather holding a riding crop in her hand.

Despite your utter terror you feel arousel, at the sight of the scaly woman...You blush

"Time for punishment." She says
121.title: A Fantasy Come True!

1212.content:
"Wait! You can't do this!" You say backing into a corner "There is no need to get violent all because I stole some soup!"

Rosie licks her scaly lips and kisses her riding crop

"You don't understand my dear boy." She purrs "I'm a dragon nobody steals from me weather it be my dishes or secrets."

"You're not all dragon you know..." You say trying to think of a way to save your hide "You're half human..."

Her bright yellow eyes start glowing with anger and she scowls revealing her fangs

"Well if you're going to be that way I guess I'll just have to do it the old fashoned way..."

She grabs you by the scruff of your neck and tosses you onto the bed!

She raises her riding crop with one hand and holds you down with the other, with a fierce SWAT the crop lands smack down on you're rear and you scream bloody murder!

"Scream all you want my boy." She says bringing anouter swat to your rump "No one will hear you."

"Mercy!" You cry out

She stops for a second "I suppose I should be reasonable." She says "Would you rather I smack you with my bare hand? Or have a switch I could try out, or I have a strap...Which would you prefer?"
1212.title: Your initiation begins

choices: Emerald does not take off your underwear
12121.content:
"I don't prefer anything!" you yell and manage to break free and head for the door.

"Emerald!" Rosie calls out. "Stop him!"

Out in the hall is a green lizard woman who grabs you and drags you back into the room. There is a struggle but finally Rosie has you pinned down.

"I'll hold him down while you pull off his pants," Rosie says.

"Not my pants!" you say. "Are you crazy?!"

You struggle but Rosie and Emerald together are too much for you. Rosie's strong arms hold you down while Emerald pulls at your jeans. You feel your belt unbuckled and your jeans sliding down.

"Please don't take off my pants," you cry.

"Don't be a crybaby," Rosie says. "You should of thought of what would happen when you stole my soup."

"I was just tasting it!" you say. "You make wonderful soup!" You hope a little flattery will change her mind but there is a frown on her face.

Emerald gets your jeans off and tosses them aside. "His underpants, too?" she askes Rosie.

"No!" you scream.
12121.title: Pants Off!

choices: Emerald does not pull off your briefs
121211.content:
Emerald hooks her fingers in the waistband of your briefs and starts to pull them down.

"No! No! No!" you sob and start crying.

"I can't do it," Emerald says. "I don't like to see a big boy cry."

"Emerald, don't wimp out on me," Rosie says. "He's just crying to get out of a spanking."

"Those are real tears," Emerald says. "Does he really deserve so much suffering? All he did was take some soup."

"Emerald! If you don't take his underpants off right now I'm going to spank you instead and I won't be so gentle this time."

Emerald blushed, remembering how Rosie had initiated her into the pleasures of spanking just a few nights previously. "Promise me this," Emerald said. "You won't hurt him. You'll be gentle."

"Emerald! You're taking all the fun out of the spanking! It's punishment, dammit, not a tickling session."

While this argument is going on you are still pinned down on the bed by Rosie and you are just wearing your underpants. Even though one of the girls is a lizard woman and the other is a dragon, they are still girls and you are half-naked. You feel yourself getting a little aroused. Oh no, you think. That's all I need now - an erection. You try to think of ice cubes. That's your secret method of making unwanted boners go away.

"Anyway," Rosie says. "He's probably just ashamed we're going to see his little weewee. You know how boys are. If they don't have a big one, they don't like anyone to see it."

This talk about your "weewee" doesn't help your boner problem. It just makes it worse. You know your penis is a normal-sized penis, but hearing girls talk about it makes it stiffer, and feeling it grow stiffer in your underpants makes you feel like it is becoming gigantically obvious. And maybe it is.

"Aha!" Rosie says. "Maybe it's not so little after all. Look at the front of his underwear."

Emerald stares at the growing lump in your briefs. "What's it doing?" she says.

Rosie shakes her head in disgust. "Zheesh, Emerald! Are you a virgin? Don't you even know what an erection is?"

Emerald's eyes grow wide. "I thought that was only when boys have sex."

Rosie laughs. "You ARE innocent, aren't you? Pull off his underpants right now and you'll see something. And I promise when I spank him I'll go easy."

"Well..." Emerald says. Her face is full of curiosity.

You have your eyes closed wondering when this torture will end. No female has ever seen your penis before. Well, your mother when you were little, and Aunt Vicky when she accidentally barged into the bathroom that time, but no one else. You squirm as you feel Emerald's fingers on your briefs again. It's frightening, but it's pleasurable too. Maybe if Rosie keeps her promise to be gentle it won't be so bad.

You feel Emerald slowly slide your briefs down...

She goes to her mini-fridge and comes back with
1212111.title: A good hard spank!

12121111.content:
You lay on the bed while Rosie and Emerald have a tea party on your naked butt.

"This cantaloupe is delicious," Emerald says.

You can feel the honey dripping down your ass crack.

"Oops!" Rosie says. "Getting messy here."

Then her long dragon tongue starts licking the honey out of your crack. Your eyeballs roll up and your mouth falls open. Oooooo! Feels so gooood! You almost start kicking one of your feet like a dog getting tickled.

"You like that, dontcha?" Rosie says. "I'm licking this honey off because I don't want to get my hand sticky when I whack you... like THIS!"

And WHACK! Her big hand slaps your butt cheek... hard. You almost jump a mile.

Emerald lifts her hand high and swings it down toward your butt. Will she connect?
12121111.title: Naked Tea Party

choices: Decides to let it slip by
121211111.content:
You hear a resounding WHACK! But not before you feel it, You feel yourself getting a boner again and you begin to realize you are enjoying this 'punishment'

Emerald goes for a second swing but she misses, her sharp litte claws how ever graze your skin and you feel a delighful shiver go up your spine, your nipples harden.

Dame Hilda is the Headmistress of the school, she seems to be the most horrific old lady you ever laid your eyes on.

121211111.title: Headmistress

1212111112.title: Decides to let it slip by

121211112.content:
It seems that Emerald was more than a little tipsy from all the fruit. When she went to spank you, her hand missed entirely, instead sweeping mere inches above your back. The momentum (coupled with her sort-of-intoxication) caused Emerald to fall over on her side next to you.
"Whoopsh!" she giggled, raising her arm up again. "Thissh thime for shure."
The last thing you hear is a "NO! WAIT!" and a whooshing sound before everything went dark.

***

Some time later, you wake up and wish you hadn't. It's all you can do not to scream. It's impossible to say which hurts more, your butt or your head. Your butt's on fire from the spanking, while your head feels like it's going to split open at a moments notice. After what felt like hours (really just a few minutes) you raise your head to take in your surroundings. You're back in your dorm room. Not safe and sound, tonight has shone you THAT, but in the dorm room nonetheless.

You look over to where Pyro's bed stands. Pyro is...
121211112.title: Complete Miss

1212111121.content:
Pyro is sleeping soundly, chest rising and falling as he breathes. You smile at his prone form, but you can't help but think, You're next, buddy...You're next.

You quietly shift your body into what you hope to be a more comfortable point on your bed. It's obvious that you're going to be sleeping on your front tonight. (Which in turn means that tomorrow you'll be spending the day with a stiff neck, which always happens when you sleep on your front.)

In the hours that follow, at some point, you notice that someone wrote "PAID IN FULL" in marker on the palm of your left hand. Well, at least that's over, you think to yourself.

***

You were severly wrong about it being over. The real suffering came the next day. Some time in the night you finally passed out, but this only gave you three or four hours of sleep. Your butt's still on fire, while your head is threatening a fully-fledged migrane. Just as you predicted, your neck is stiff and achey from sleeping on your front.

All of this means that you're groggy, inatentive, and you can't sit still. You've already gotten detentions in your first three classes of the day, and break period sees you wandering around aimlessly. Unfortunately, you wandering out by the sports equipment shed, which is where the jocks hang out during break. The jocks that would regularly beat you up, before you met Pyro. But Pyro isn't here right now. You realize this all too late.

When you snap back into reality, you see that the football team has surrounded you, and that they're smiling. It isn't a friendly smile.
1212111121.title: Aftereffects of Spanking

12121111211.content:
What did you do to upset the Universe in this way? What did you do in a previous incarnation to deserve this punishment? You ponder these things and others like them at the living daylights are beaten out of you. The football team hasn't gotten to do this for awhile, so they're milking the opportunity for all it's worth. And apparently, it's worth a LOT to them.

Except, this time it's different. You're on the ground, covering your head while the guys take turns stomping on and kicking you. But then you hear a growling, followed by lots of swearing (such language!), and screams of agony. Oh, great, you think. Someone else wants to beat me up, and the don't want to share me.

You curl up tightly as you here footsteps draw near. The new hostile entity (it can't be Pyro, who's meeting with a teacher to discuss extra credit options this period) draws closer and closer and then...picks you up gently? That's not right. Where's the brutal torture? Where's the suffering? You're already in position to receive it.

But no, this newcomer carries you away, always careful as to how they hold you. After carrying you for awhile, the newcomer says, in a distinctly female voice, "Don't worry, it'll be okay now." That was it. That was what put you over the edge. Upon hearing that, you broke down and began crying, and shortly thereafter passed out from exhaustion.

***

"Nurse, how is he doing?" A female voice.
"Well, he could be better, but he could definitely be worse. Although, from your description, you intervened at just the right time." A second female voice.
"If I didn't do anything, they might have killed him!...And, I owed him...We had a, uh, brief altercation earlier, and I wanted to make right." The first female voice, your rescuer.
"Well, you did that much, that's for sure. Oh, pardon me. I need to make a trip to the Ladies Room." The second female voice. Footsteps. A door closing.

You climb further and further into consciousness, to the point where you can open your eyes. You're in the infirmary. And sitting next to you, your rescuer is...
12121111211.title: Suffering and...Rescue?

12123.content:
"Let me go!" you yell. "I didn't do anything!"

You struggle with Rosie but everytime you seem about to escape she pulls you back. Nevertheless, you don't stay still long enough for her to do any spanking. Eventually you are both tired out and gasping for breath.

"Alright," she gasps. "I'll make a deal with you. I won't spank you. I'll just tie you up for an hour."

"What kind of deal is that?" you say.

"It's simple," she says. "You don't get spanked. You just get tied up. That's your punishment."

"For just an hour?"

"Yes."

"Promise?"

"I swear on my mother's grave."

You hold out your hands and let her tie them together, then she ties them to the bed post. Then she ties your feet together.

"Set the alarm clock for one hour," you say.

Rosie chuckles. "You're such a trusting little boy, aren't you?"

She opens a drawer and takes out a leather strap. She slaps it against her leg. "Get ready to cry, soup stealer."

"Hey!" you cry. "You promised on your mother's grave!"

"I'm an orphan, you little moron. I have no idea where my mother's grave is. She was probably cremated."

Rosie undoes your belt and unsnaps your jeans. "Let's get a look at that butt."

"Stop it!" you shout. "Don't take my pants off!"

But Rosie unsnaps you, unzips you, and tugs the legs of your trousers until your tight whities are exposed.

Rosie swings the strap up, then down on your butt. WHAP!

"Ow!" you say. "This is insane!"

WHAP!

WHAP! WHAP! WHAP!

Now you are in sobbing mode. You hardly know what you are saying, just that you are begging Rosie to stop.

info.brief_description: You're a nerdy boy who never gets the girl, Soon your darkest dreams will come true
info.description:
You are a nerdy boy attending Prep School, you a tall geeky sort of loser boy. Even though you have great passion and lust, girls just never notce you because you're so homly and geeky.

You've always been a good obediant kid, you're parents never spanked you so you have no idea what it's like, that will soon change

This takes place in the same universe as the Jocks VS Nerds series, the player character (You) are a human while your best friend (Pyro) is a Dragon.

Rules:

Only Female on male spanking F/M not the reverse
No scat or watersports, I will delete any batroom humor
Bare bottomed spanking is OK
Sex is allowed but only after spanking

Have fun
